patthana16.34:4.1: Ācayagāmiṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naācayagāmī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.34:4.3: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.34:5.1: Ācayagāmiṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naapacayagāmī nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.34:5.3: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
